thread.title: PSG player visits Qatar IFTM stand in Paris
thread.title_full: PSG player visits Qatar IFTM stand in Paris | MENAFN.COM

author: The Peninsula
title: PSG player visits Qatar IFTM stand in Paris
text:
(MENAFN - The Peninsula)William Accambray PSG Handball Team’s left back holds a falcon during a visit to Qatar’s IFTM Top Resa stand in Paris. 

DOHA: William Accambray Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) Handball Team’s left back visited Qatar’s IFTM Top Resa stand in Paris. 

Accambray shared his experience of Qatar with participants saying “Our pre-season training camp last August in Qatar gave us the opportunity to rediscover Qatar its culture and history. 

“From a sport point of view we enjoyed high-quality sport facilities which allowed the team to prepare in the best conditions. It’s always a pleasure to visit Qatar.” 

Laura Georges and Kheira Hamraoui also spent some time at Qatar’s booth to take part in a calligraphy workshop alongside French bloggers. 

Qatar Tourism Authority (QTA) showcased the country’s increasingly diverse offerings at Top Resa last week through a 100sqm exhibition stand that also highlighted Qatar’s leisure and recreational facilities. 

QTA’s partnership with PSG has helped increase French awareness of Qatar as a destination grow in recent years in addition to Qatar’s presence in several high-profile French events including Chantilly Arts & Elegance and Qatar Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe. 

France is now Qatar’s second largest source market in Europe. 
The Peninsula
